author: wn.com
title: Rally 4 Recovery Closing Ceremony to be Held at the Bernadette Women's Minimum Security Facility ...
text: ( Source : State of Rhode Island ) CRANSTON, R.I. - October 7, 2015 - In recognition of National Recovery Month, the Rhode Island Department of Corrections ( RIDOC ) will host the closing rally at the Bernadette Women 's Minimum Security Facility
